actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Commerce.
Reported to Senate from the Committee on Commerce with amendment, S. Rept. 94-866.
Senate vitiated its action on passage.
Measure indefinitely postponed in Senate, H.R. 13380 passed in lieu.

official_title: A bill to amend the Central, Western, and South Pacific Fisheries Development Act to extend the appropriation authorization through fiscal year 1979.

summary.text: (Reported to Senate from the Committee on Commerce with amendment, S. Rept. 94-866) Requires the Secretary of Commerce to report annually, by January 30, to the President and the Congress on his activities pursuant to the Central, Western, and South Pacific Fisheries Development Act. Authorizes appropriations to carry out such Act, as follows: $300,000 for the transition period from July 1 through September 30, 1976; and $1,333,333 for each of the fiscal years 1977-1979.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Central, Western, and South Pacific Fisheries Development Act to extend the appropriation authorization through fiscal year 1979.
